alert.note: Alert for Carter; Powder River (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 8:49PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN CARTER AND NORTHEASTERN POWDER RIVER COUNTIES THROUGH 930 PM MDT... At 849 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 18 miles southwest of Ridgeway, or 32 miles east of Broadus, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ridgeway, Belltower, Boyes, and Hammond. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
